Open a template for editing

1 Start Customize if necessary.

If Customize is already open, click the Open button , or on the File menu, click Open.

2 Click a template name on the list.

The Prefix box displays the file name prefix for the configuration file that contains template settings.

The Encounter Type box indicates the hospital environment in which the template will be used. Depending on where CareSuite is used, the list may include entries for perioperative, critical care and general wards.

For more information, see Templates, Sessions and Encounters.

The Edit button allows you to edit the names of the existing encounters and add new ones.

3 Click Open.
